author.name: Anthony
author.description: Web developer, author and online course instructor with Vue.js Developers

description: SPAs typically provide a page to the browser that has no meaningful content. Content is instead loaded by AJAX as the user navigates the site. Can a search engine index this content? Does it rank as well as static HTML? This article will attempt to bring clarity to these questions.
name: Is My Single-Page Application SEO Friendly?
